a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Change of GDP per capita over the last generation in countries with a
high share in extreme poverty, 1990 to 2022
GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and for price differences between countries, it is measured in constant international-$.
Data source: World Bank (2023); Our World in Data
